metadata.title: CVE-2013-2022 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities inactionscript/Jplayer.as in the Flash SWF component (jplayer.swf) in jPlayerbefore 2.2.23 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia the (1) jQuery or (2) id parameters, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2013-1942 and CVE-2013-2023, as demonstrated by using the alertfunction in the jQuery parameter. NOTE: these are the same parameters asCVE-2013-1942, but the fix for CVE-2013-1942 uses a blacklist for thejQuery parameter.

criterions.comment: jplayer package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
